channel.title: Everytime my client encounters the thieving stat icon on a level up, it freezes?
channel.description:
What I mean is for example. Say I am on my source testing thieving. After a certain amount of experience points, I get a level up and the client freezes.
If it helps the client I am using is Kihomura's Client for 317 servers. My Base Server I am using is Delta.
Thank-you in advance.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 08, 2010, 07:42:40 pm[/size][hr]bump^
